Hi all,

It has been a while since I have uploaded anything, so I decided to upload a jailbreak map that I made over 4 years ago. It was exclusively on the Dying 2 Kill CS:S jailbreak server, but that has since closed down, so I thought I would release the map for those that still play.

The map features 17 minigames of varying types, including:
  • Hide N Seek (requires Source mod plugin for thirdperson)
  • Hunger games
  • RNG cannon
  • Hangman
  • Zombie rush
  • Skipping
  • Zombie snipers
  • Obstacle course
  • Climb
  • Nade wars
  • Knock knock
  • A few more
  • Furniture game

The map also has many creative play areas and tools.

There are 2 RNG encounters while walking down 2 of the coridoors. One will spawn zombies from each side, which need to be killed or they will kill you. The other will break the floor, revealing a small obstacle course in order to get through.

Much time was spent developing this map, so I hope you all enjoy it. There may be a few broken things, so if that is the case, let me know.

This is an updated version of ba_conditioned, a map i released earlier. This version fixes a problem with the original map, there wasnt anything fun to do except fight to take over the prison.

In this version there is a Deathrace. The prize is an awp and freedom but the penalty for just about any mistake or turn of misfortune while on the death run is death. There are sliding walls and rotating platforms that are bound to tagets in a shooting range. There are 2 teams: red and blue(that can consist of ts vs tcs or just ts vs ts if there are heaps). Both teams elect two players to shoot for their team in the shooting range(The shooting booths are bound to the level 1 weapons cabinet circuit to allow control of the deagles housed therein). A hit on either team's target at the right time may help, hinder or even kill the competitors on that team in the race for the awp, and the only way for the shooters to tell when to shoot is communication with the competitors, so mics are advantageous. Any number of competitors may enter the race at the same time, so it makes for a good jew run.

There is a rage room:any deathrace competitor who makes it to the final stage and decides they cannot beat their fellow competitors in a fair race, can jump into a teleport that sends them to a room overlooking the final stage of the race, that has a pair of paras and a hurtbrush, giving the raging player an oppurtunity to reap their manical revenge on their superior opponants until their life runs out. This room is also used as a punishment for trying to shortcut certain parts of the race by jumping off the roof.

There is a fan surrounded by a pool in the open area, with a push brush firing upward, overlaid. This is also a gambit of sorts, supposed to be used for knife or chicken fights. The brush usually pushes the player up a few feet and they fall back down to be pushed again, but occasionally it will launch the player bouncing on it, up to great heaghts, sometimes the full height of the map However the higher you go the more likely it becomes that the push brush wont be able to counter the momentum of your next fall and you will die, hence ther is a pool to catch you should your confidence falter(this was about as stable as i could get it). If the player is launched high enough they hit a teleport that sends them to a humorously surreal ninja-sky-knife-arena

Theres an area for simon says and a pair of vents with push brushes ovelooking a pool for a variant of guntoss, and there is a soccer field on the roof. Ive also added health dispensers.

Hi, Finnaly i end the bug hunt and adjust the gameplay. Their will be an another version later with gameplay improvement, but no new games. List of changes: -Race of light: first level has been redesign
-lotto: no more blocked lvl, but a new bonus.
-Maze: particles fixed
-tetris: level balanced and CT can play
-Skipping rope: speed fixed, doors fixed
-cavern: all displacement has been remade
-pool: purple light added to help warden
-death race ligth added to help players
-HDR fixed
And a lot of fix and balance i forgot. I know their still bugs/incoherences; but i havent the time to fix all of them. Maybe in the last version.
I creat a new thread because player HAVE TO change their version: the v3a is full of little bugs.

Hi First I want to thanks ace of spaces who is the original author of the map, two years ago I fall in love and started to work in three versions.
Today i'm glad to present to you the v3 after one year with the v2.
The v3 add four new games to the map, fix others and add features which impact in the gameplay
Games:

-Skiping rope:
Discover a new style of skiping rope with an hardcore one, you have 3speed and 3 blade.
All is securized to make sure noone will kill all T by use a button.
-Maze:
In each maze I saw in Jailmaps there was only one way to end, so after 4-5try the winners were thoses who run the faster and maze became race.
I introduce a new kind of maze: you have to find an item in the maze. It will spawn randomly in a two level unreal like with monsters and trap available.
-Human tetris:
Because japanese make us laught I give them a tribute.
The T team have to pass into hole symbolise by a character. You can personalise each game with three levels, hot lava and cage.
-Climb:
Cause now the players of my team will say race for the race and no more climb!
A simple game, no entities just a climb.

Features:

I add a lotto, each round will be different:
20% the two races are unavailable
20% tetris and fork game are unavailable
20% climb and skiping rope are unavailable
40% Surprize event!
This mechanic require the warden to change games and make a break in the monotony.
some of the events make the round end in the two first minutes. I add more guns, because in our team we think T must have the weapons to be able to make a rebellion we also think they need to deserve it.
So T will find heavy weapons with magasines but only in the wardens blocks, it will never on the way of the games.
The map was released the 04july so if you find bugs, plz notify them here :)
Sorry for my bad english

ba prison confused v1

At this map, I wanted to make a contrast between two places. I mean that Cts will spawn at a nice place where they will get weapons pressing a button of buying them, and the prisioners will start at a basement where walls have got blood, zombies shuting, electrical fences, a dirty infirmary...

If you want to go to the basements, you must take the elevators. Terrorist are divided at two places so Cts have to go to differents jails.

There are a lot of details:

1º In a jail, there is a zombie shouting.
2º Buttons with spawn weapons will lock after about 50 scounds so Ts will not be able to steal them.
3º There is a button where you can turn off the lights of the map so Terrorist can stay in a corner and Cts can see them.
4º Electrical fence with give realism.
5º A pool dirty where if you are lucker, you can find a weapon. But it do not usually happen because weapons will not spawn at the same place.
6ºIf you press the button to go up and the elevator go down, get ready to kill a zombie or he will kill you.
7ºThere are two basements so there are two infirmaries.

Have fun.

This is a game concept that a couple of friends, including myself, created during our massive Metal Gear phase. We originally played this game using Airsoft guns and toy knives. The concept of this game is for the Snakes(CT's) to take out the guards(T's) without being noticed. The map includes multiple areas for stealthy encoucounters. The guards are provided with armor, primary and secondary weapons, and a grenade. The snakes are provided with a USP, nvg's, flashbangs, and smoke grenades. The idea is for the guards to protect the house using their flashlights to spot enemies, while the snakes are to infiltrate and neutralize.

Constructive Criticism is appreciated for improvement of this map.
Thankyou.

P.S. SvG means Snake versus Guard

Mg_stealth_tunnel

Created by Drew (PWN3R)

Inspired by breakfloor, this map consists of rows and columns of breakable cubes in which you can create a tunnel to get onto the enemy's side, and kill them. This map is much bigger than breakfloor, giving you more room to create your own secret tunnels or hiding spots. Don't burrow too far; you can fall out the bottom and die!

This map looks really nice. By using a 3D skybox, the map appears to be inside a vertical tunnel, which is rendered to be 16 times the maximum possible height of a Source engine map! To add to the atmosphere, this map has some nice HL2 touches, like the combine forcefield and a strider.

This map has been fully tested of gameplay exploits, and does not lag servers.

Enjoy!

Have fun !! :) ssbm xmas beta5 Now it works on Orange box Engine! =============== http://www.noelshack.com/up/aac/mapsurprise-8b3ed91254.jpg You need to be in multiplayer and have atleast two players so the map doesn't automatically kills you! ======================================================================================================= Goal: Eliminate all others to be the last survivor and win 10 points. A Santa Claus on a sleigh fly and sends gifts in its path, follow it to get a gift. Beware the storm that can happen when you least imagine it will pull everyone into the middle. Left click = push ennemie (only in front of you) Use = take gift Right click = use a gift 3 gifts, Teleportation, Expulsion, big snowball 2 gifts can't be taken simultanetely Teleportation = random teleport in the map icon
Expulsion = Expulse players around you icon
big snowball = shot a big snowball in front of you icon Pushing an ennemie too near of him will result by not pushing him NOTE: If you find any bug, post them here NOTE2: to make it work better, use those commands: sv gravity 200 sv airaccelerate 100 mp limitteams 18 mp freezetime 0 NOTE3: max 18 players NOTE4: if you tele with only 2 players left it may result by killing everyone, it's a know bug that we will soon fix. NOTE5: It won't work if you play alone, it will kill you, you need to be 2 or more ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

mg_nemball by Nemesis

The idea is to put the ball into the opponents goals before they do the same to you. Simple right?.

To add in some extra fun there are ramps around the map that allow the players to boost off and get to places faster. After 5 minutes into the game scouts will also spawn on the top platforms for players to use

Extra features include:
-x2 run speed 
-Half gravity so its easier to jump with speed.
-Air acceleration (to turn of course).
-A funny looking ball.
-A button that will play music in game.

Anything else will probably be explained at the start of each round once the map is started.

3rd release of Mountain Course

*Changes from version 1*
- Raised ceiling in the post jumping room
- Added dividers to the 3-path room
- Fixed the losers teleport
- Fixed the WINNING teleport
- Fixed the winners teleport

**2/2 Major Update: Can now fire all weapons continuously without need to reload.**

This virtual shooting range aims to improve your muscle memory, reactions and aim, through repetition and target practice. Simply spawn, pick your weapon and compete against up to 5 other team-mates in a head to head battle of champions. 

You can tailor session time to suit yourself: easily select from either first to 25/50/75/100 targets to win. The system will automatically cycle through targets at random, giving you that genuine flick-shot opportunity every time. Anyone who completes 100 or above will enjoy bonus music and credits. Defeated players will automatically be slayed. 

The round will not begin unless all players have "readied up," by shooting the red light in the center of the cross-hair. The map will detect how many players are in-game and is fun solo or with any number up to 5 people.

Each player can chose from Ak/M4/Awp/Deagle with 999 clip capacity, or alternatively purchase something from the buyzone. 

Whether you use it for fun or training, I hope you will enjoy my map and hopefully become an even better player!

Features:
1 Song : I knew you were Trouble - Taylor Swift
Fun to Play
Not many bugs
Terrific Iceskate
Epic Disco-Room
Good Lighting
Challenging Map for people new to MG Courses.


***Special Thanks to - Kippe, Chriizc, Skyrocket, Omarfire00, and Hunter/Zombiephobia/Knife***

***Extract the map to cstrike/maps/***

Thanks, guys!

JOIN CT!

Map inspired by the game "Minecraft". Created with the source graphics engine for Counter-Strike Source.
=======objective=======

Trying to get to the center, to enter the portal, which will take you to choose the multiple games, which are:

Scout and Knife: typical scout and knife map. Kill the other team with Scout and Knife.

AWP: AWP typical map. Kill the other team with AWP.

Ice Skate: typical ice skate map. Kill the other team with Knife.

Race: typical race map. Run as fast as you can and overcoming all obstacles, to reach first and get the m249.

Bhop: typical bhop map. Jump as fast as possible, reach the end and get the m249.

Knife Battle: kill the other team with a single blow with the knife.

Random Weapons: Each round will be different, try to point you in the head.

Climb: Climb typical map. Upload as fast as you can without falling, and you will get the m249.

Train: Buy a gun, you have 10 seconds to do, and 3 seconds to hop on the train, which will go to full speed. Try to kill the other team, before they do so.

HE: HE typical map. If in 5 min not win, it will break the barrier.

Survive: Try to survive the fall of TNT, these will fall randomly, try to 
last longer than your opponent.

Zombie Attack: Try to survive the hordes coming at you from all sides, headshots, to kill and shooting in the arm to not get hurt. Care at the end, with the Enderman.

Break Glass: breaking vidro of where your opponent well, make him fall.

Diamon Search: search the entire mine diamonds in chests and in its raw form, when you get the 3 diamonds earn.

Strongholds: finds the portal to the end. in order to win.

Total: 15 minigames + 1 random for the undecided.

=======NEW=======

Add music 8 different songs 
add auto game choose after 2min 
Bhop: if someone gets the m249 the other players will be teleported to the end, and if no one comes to the end all players will be teleported and will be given a knife.

Scout: now the players can climb de trees.

Awp: now the bridge appears after 2min.

Climb: add falldamage and water removed.

Iceskate: add some obstacles.

Survive: TNT damage reduced.

Granade: is changed the size of the holes

Stronghold: when someone finds the portal to the END, all players will be teleported to the END and the winner will give you a m249.

Trains: add other train.

Random weapons: underground was added another path.

Race: remove ladders.

Zombie horde: add buyzone, the place was expanded

skybox fixed

If there are errors, comment :).
Enjoy FuChuSS
Credit to Steven000.
if you have any map ideas, opinions, or question let me know or add me @the last black guy on css
